HDTV means high definition television... which was primarily defined once media was available BEYOND 480p; 480p is NOT HDTV and therefore makes the tag incorrect and more of an oxymoron.

The 3rd season ended with a mid-season finale, but that makes it INCOMPLETE as a WHOLE because it is UNFINISHED. Not everyone who downloads it will know this, which is why the title is WRONG once again.

Please, don't fight over facts here. I understand: This guy put in his time, some effort, and some care. There is absolutely nothing wrong with stating the truth that this is far from hdtv and complete, so stop denying it to justify his mistakes.

Anyway, take care guys, and enjoy the show.
